title: Giro d’Italia Stage 12: Resurgent Julian Alaphilippe Rampages to Breakaway Win
content:
Alaphilippe scores first grand tour victory since 2021, silences the critics with sensational solo in wild classics-style Giro stage.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 12: Resurgent Julian Alaphilippe Rampages to Breakaway Win on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
